summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the amended assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2322, for the improvement of Carr Place, from Ewing Street to the north margin of North 38th Street from the east; and North 37th Street, between Carr Place and Woodlawn Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, providing for the necessary surface drainage,, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon and making necessary connections to existing improvements; provided however, that concrete walks be constructed on the west side only of Carr Place, between the limits above mentioned, under Ordinance No. 24031 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
